attributes.action: NO to Public Fireworks - End public sales and limit use to Licensed Events only!
attributes.additional_details:
I believe this is a matter of public safety due to injury’s caused as well as for the safety and wellbeing of all animals.
The impact fireworks have on pets/wildlife is devastating, the anxiety and panic it causes due to them not understanding what is happening is unnecessary. If fireworks are limited to organised licensed events and to the 5th November only then owners can prepare and protect their pets/animals as well as not having as much of an impact on wildlife due to the reduced locations.
attributes.background:
I want the Government to ban all firework sales to the general public and limit these sales to organised and licensed events only. 
I also want these fireworks to only be legal to use on the 5th November.
